en.confirm_delete_info: For security reasons, double validation is required when deleting user.
en.name_not_equal: The name entered is inconsistent with the name of the user to delete.
en.name_check_tip: The name of the input should be same as the name of the user to be deleted
en.modal_multistage_banner: This page shows the linkage of multi-stage pop, supporting unlimited level.The use of multilevel pop is very simple. It only needs to call another pop in current pop. This page's source code:

zh-CN.confirm_delete_info: 为了安全起见，删除用户的时候需要做双重验证。
zh-CN.name_not_equal: 输入的姓名跟要删除的用户姓名不一致。
zh-CN.name_check_tip: 输入的姓名跟要删除的用户姓名一致
zh-CN.modal_multistage_banner: 这个页面展示了多级pop的联动，支持无限级。使用多级pop非常简单，只需要在pop中再调用其他pop即可！该页源代码：
